name: Biuld
description: Modern desktop messaging platform for developers with real-time chat, code sharing, and collaboration features
longDescription: A production-ready desktop chat application built for developers, featuring real-time messaging, code sharing, file attachments, and advanced collaboration features. Built with React, Node.js, Socket.IO, and PostgreSQL.

name: Starms Catering
description: Modern catering website with user reviews, event gallery, and admin dashboard
longDescription: A comprehensive catering website featuring responsive design, user review system, event gallery, contact forms, and Firebase-powered admin dashboard for content management.

name: Honeycomb Nexus
description: Interactive Web3 experience showcasing the Honeycomb Discovery Layer
longDescription: An immersive Web3 application that demonstrates blockchain interaction through dynamic gameplay and on-chain identity features, built with modern web technologies.
